page.title: 13BURGHFIELD-OTHER RELIGIONS
page.content: Aswell as two Anglican churches in the area,the Roman Catholics and Metho- dists also have places of worship. St.Oswald's is the Roman Catholic church.The building was built in 1975 and opened in 1976,and,although small, includes space for a Sunday school and a kitchen.The priest is Father G.Hold- away. In 1985,an Ecumenical Youth Group was started to strengthen inter-church and community links in the area.A special service was held at St.Oswald's in September. To mark the 40th anniversary of the Hiroshima atomic bomb,a peace vigil and procession between St.Oswald's and Burghfield St.Mary's was held by Fran- ciscans in the area in August 1985. Methodist Church on Reading Road is the venue for Methodists' worship.The minister is Rev.A.Robinson.
